overview.base: You can hear all moving creatures within 30 feet. If the creature is breathing, you can hear it even if it is not moving. You can not detect @L[Condition:Silent]{silent} creatures in this way.
You vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{quarter speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed}.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.
